scan_linter_check.description: Sys IDs should not be stated explicitly in source code. Code should be independent of specific records in the platform. An execption are AppInstall() functions which may have to refer to specific records to perform changes during installation. Also, the function RunScriptInScope() must refer to a specific script include record to work.
scan_linter_check.name: CodeSanity - Sys IDs in scripts
scan_linter_check.resolution_details: Refactor code to move Sys IDs into system properties or into another dynamic source - or retrieve the Sys IDs of records dynamically.
scan_linter_check.short_description: Check for the Sys ID in script anti-pattern
